about_the_game:
In NANOVOID it's not just about the shooting - it's about outsmarting your enemies. Customize and command your modular ship where each piece adds a unique function and can be the difference between victory and defeat. But beware, your enemies aren't just a health bar. Their ships also use the same modular system, meaning you'll need to strategically target their ship's components to disable them effectively.



Engage in intense battles where the laws of physics reign supreme. Every movement, every shot fired, every explosion generates forces that can be used to your advantage - or lead to your downfall if mismanaged.

Features:

  • Modular Ships: Build your own spaceship from various modules, each with its own function and characteristics.
  • Realistic Physics: All actions have consequences, and the realistic physics engine brings a new level of depth to space combat.
  • Tactical Combat: Outmaneuver your enemies, target their weak points, and use the environment to your advantage.
  • Epic Encounters: Face off against a variety of enemies, each with their own unique behaviors, attack patterns, and weaknesses.
  • Stunning Visuals: Experience the beauty and chaos of space with visually stunning graphics and special effects.

In this 2D tactical space shooter, you'll engage in fast-paced battles against deadly enemies and bosses, using strategy and planning to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents. Utilize your skills and reflexes to take down powerful bosses, and immerse yourself in a beautifully designed universe with stunning visuals and special effects.

Fly and fight using intuitive WSAD controls and mouse aim. The open space offers strategic possibilities, allowing you to retreat and recover your shields before re-engaging.

Customize and command your modular ship where each piece adds a unique function and can be the difference between victory and defeat. But beware, your enemies aren't just a health bar. Engage in intense battles where the laws of physics reign supreme. Every movement, every shot fired, every explosion generates forces that can be used to your advantage - or lead to your downfall if mismanaged.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 or compatible
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey (Mac OS 12)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

name: NANOVOID

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: NANOVOID is a 2D tactical space shooter that puts you in command of your own modular spaceship. Engage in intense, physics-driven battles, strategize with ship customization, and outsmart your enemies
